profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.3.3 Composite fonts - CIDToGIDMap
profile.description: For all Type 2 CIDFonts, the CIDFont dictionary shall contain a CIDToGIDMap entry that shall be a stream mapping from CIDs to glyph indices or the name Identity, as described in PDF Reference Table 5.13
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
